place.name: SUTTON UNDER BRAILES
place.gazetteerText: SUTTON-UNDER-BRAILS, a parish in Shipston-on-Stour district, Warwick; 7¼ miles NE by E of Moreton r. station. Post town, Shipston-on-Stour. Acres, 1,135. Rated property, £1,651. Pop., 227. Houses, 47. The manor belongs to Sir P. V. Pole, Bart. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Gloucester and Bristol. Value, £313.* Patron, the Bishop of G. and B. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
